presentationTable.name: Project Accounting Costs in Ledger Currency
presentationTable.description: Accounted Projects Costs from Subledger Accounting as well as costs accounted in External Application

presentationColumns.name: Accounted Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Raw Cost Amount that is accounted
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Accounted Raw Cost in Ledger Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accounted Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Burden Cost Amount that is accounted
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Accounted Burden Cost in Ledger Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accounted Burdened Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Burdened Cost Amount that is accounted
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Accounted Burdened Cost in Ledger Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Debit Amount from Accounting for the Cost Distribution line
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Debit Amount in Ledger Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Credit Amount from Accounting for the Cost Distribution line
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Credit Amount in Ledger Currency

presentationColumns.name: Net Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the difference between Debit Amount and Credit Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project SLA Costing.Net Amount in Ledger Currency
